Html:
I unzipped the web and database script zip into its own folder. I used the scripts to create a database. I opened the web folder in Visual Web Developer Express 2008 SP1 and ran it. First I get a directory listing of the files in the /web directory. Then I add /Kigg to the URL so it looks like this: http://localhost:51707/Web/Kigg. In Firefox I get a blank page, in IE I get a 404 not found. Help?

Dave.
I get a directory listing of the files in the main Kigg web directory. :(
